# [FEAT] AI Agents/Bots

## Labels
`ai`, `automation`, `priority:high`

## Description
Implement AI-powered agents/bots for automated customer interactions and ticket resolution.

## Requirements

### Bot Capabilities
- Automated customer greeting
- FAQ answering
- Ticket routing
- Information collection
- Simple task completion
- Handoff to human agents

### Conversation Flow
- Guided conversation flows
- Decision trees
- Natural language understanding
- Context retention
- Multi-turn conversations

### Bot Builder
- Visual flow designer
- No-code configuration
- Test conversations
- Bot analytics
- A/B testing

### Integration
- Knowledge base integration
- API actions
- CRM lookups
- Order status checks
- Account verification

### Handoff
- Seamless agent transfer
- Context preservation
- Handoff triggers
- Fallback handling
- Queue integration

### Channels
- Chat widget
- Messaging
- Social media
- Email (auto-responses)

## Zendesk Reference
AI agents can automate 80%+ of interactions, helping solve customer issues faster. You can deploy AI agents to automate FAQs, route issues, and deliver 24/7 support.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Bot responds to customers
- [ ] Flow builder works
- [ ] Knowledge base integration
- [ ] Handoff to agents functional
- [ ] Bot analytics available
